steps.transcript: Hello, I am a nursing student. May I confirm your identity, ask about allergies, and explain the wound care procedure?

strengths: [CommunicationAgent] Introduced themselves as a nursing student.
[KnowledgeAgent] The student correctly identifies the need to confirm the patient's identity.
[KnowledgeAgent] The student appropriately asks about allergies, which is crucial for patient safety.
[ClinicalAgent] Introduced self as a nursing student
issues_detected: [CommunicationAgent] Did not provide their name as part of the introduction.
[CommunicationAgent] Lacked a clear structure in explaining the wound care procedure.
[KnowledgeAgent] The student does not mention assessing for signs of infection or pain assessment, which are critical components of the history-taking process.
[ClinicalAgent] Did not confirm patient identity with name and date of birth
[ClinicalAgent] Did not document any responses regarding allergies

steps.transcript: The wound looks fine. I will continue.
I will clean the wound now without washing my hands.

issues_detected: [KnowledgeAgent] Failure to recognize the importance of hand hygiene before wound cleaning.
[ClinicalAgent] Skipped hand hygiene before cleaning the wound

steps.transcript: I will apply a sterile dressing and secure it properly.

strengths: [CommunicationAgent] Clear intention to apply a sterile dressing
[CommunicationAgent] Acknowledges the need for securing the dressing
[KnowledgeAgent] Acknowledgment of the need for a sterile dressing
[KnowledgeAgent] Understanding the importance of securing the dressing properly
[ClinicalAgent] Intention to apply a sterile dressing
[ClinicalAgent] Mention of securing the dressing properly
issues_detected: [CommunicationAgent] No reference to personal protective equipment
[CommunicationAgent] Does not include wound assessment steps
[KnowledgeAgent] Lack of mention of hand hygiene and personal protective equipment
[KnowledgeAgent] No assessment of the wound for signs of infection before applying the dressing
[ClinicalAgent] No mention of wearing personal protective equipment
[ClinicalAgent] No assessment of the wound for signs of infection
